detail_desc: Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a deep V-neck, long dolman sleeves and ribbed sections around the neckline, down the sleeves and at the hem.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Knee-length, V-neck nursing dress in soft jersey with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and narrow, elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative tie. Practical inner top for easier nursing access. Unlined.

Waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a hook and loop tab at the top. Loop at the front and back and chunky patterned soles. Height of soles 2.5 cm.
Shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and contrasting colour trims.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front, mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in soft viscose jersey with decorative crossover straps at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and calf-length legs.
Short, ribbed vest top with decorative buttons down the front.
Suede slippers with pile linings and insoles and soft suede soles.
Sports top in heavy jersey with taped details. Mesh-lined drawstring hood, short sleeves with ventilation holes under the arms, a kangaroo pocket, and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Short cardigan knitted in a wool blend with block-coloured sections. V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short dress in an airy organic cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Wide neckline with a V-shaped opening and narrow ties at the top, and long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Velour-covered hair elastic.

Set with two bodysuits, two pairs of leggings, a romper suit and a scarf in soft cotton jersey. Bodysuits with short sleeves and press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch. Leggings with an elasticated waist. Romper suit with long sleeves, front pockets and press-studs down the front and along one leg. Scarf with press-studs at the back of the neck.
Jumper in a soft knit. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and hem and short slits in the sides.
Top in a soft cotton blend with double frills at the front that extend over the shoulders.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waistband.
Blouse in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar, frills and concealed buttons at the front, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Sleeveless dresses in soft cotton jersey with a seam at the top and a gathered, gently flared skirt.
Brazilian briefs in mesh with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Fitted dress in soft, ribbed jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats at the top, a zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, discreet side pockets and wide legs.
Jacket in a patterned crêpe weave with a detachable tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with slits at the cuffs. No fasteners. Unlined.
Joggers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with sewn-in creases at the front and short slits at the hems.

Espadrilles with open sides, an adjustable strap with a metal buckle, elastication at the back, and a braided jute trim around the soles. Imitation leather linings and insoles, and fluted soles. Platform 4.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, lined wrapover hood and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Trousers in soft viscose jersey with a regular, elasticated waist, low crotch, side pockets and tapered legs.
Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short sleeves with a drawstring. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Weekend bag in grained imitation leather with a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap, two handles and a zip at the top. One zipped inner compartment and studs on the bottom. Lined. Size approx. 21x35x48 cm.
Linen jersey top in a relaxed fit with a V-neck, long sleeves and a tie detail at the hem.

Studio Collection. Flared trousers in heavy jersey containing glittery metallic threads. Fitted at the top with a regular waist and tailored waistband with a safety button. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, welt back pockets and extra-long legs with sewn-in creases and wide hems. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, a zip down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Unlined.
Large clip earrings with metal and sparkly stone flowers. Length 11 cm.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck, cut-out section front and back, a knot detail at the front and metal fastener at the back.
Short coat in soft faux fur with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and side pockets. Lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Leggings in stretch washed denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Leggings in cotton jersey with wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.

Lightweight sports jacket in fast-drying, breathable, functional fabric with a stand-up collar with an elastic drawstring at the back. Zip down the front with a chin guard, pockets in the side seams and long raglan sleeves.
Espadrilles with elastic gores in the sides and a braided jute trim around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Padded dog jacket in a shimmering weave with a collar and opening for a leash at the back of the neck. Openings for the front legs and an adjustable hook and loop tab that fastens at the top. Narrow elastic straps for the back legs that help to keep the jacket in place. Fleece lining.
Cardigan in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, press-studs down the front, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short trenchcoat in soft, stretch imitation suede with rounded notch lapels and a loose yoke front and back. Side pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist. No fasteners. Unlined.

Short parka in cotton twill. Hood with a faux fur lining, stand-up collar, zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front, zipped chest pocket, flap front pockets with a press-stud and press-studs at the cuffs. Concealed drawstring at the waist and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Partly lined in faux fur.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Suit waistcoat in a cotton weave with buttons down the front, front pockets and a welt chest pocket. Lined.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline that has a small opening and a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with slits and ties at the cuffs. Unlined.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly, side pockets, a fake coin pocket, fake back pockets and slim legs.
Long-sleeved top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder, lapped ribbing at the neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Washed-look cotton top in sweatshirt fabric with long, raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Suede ankle boots with low heels, pointed toes, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5 cm.
V-neck top in soft, patterned jersey with buttons at the top. Gathers at the shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem.
Hoop earrings in metal decorated with stone-like plastic beads, sparkly glass stones and metal beads. Diameter 5 cm.
Sandals in scuba fabric. Adjustable straps with a hook and loop fastening, patterned insoles and fluted soles. The sandals are made partly from recycled polyester.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front pockets in the side seams and flap chest pockets with a button. Buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
Top in patterned viscose jersey with a narrow, elasticated seam under the bust and a V-neck with ties at the top. Yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, and 3/4-length sleeves.
Sleeveless top in an airy cotton weave with a deep, flounce-trimmed V-neck front and back, pin-tucks at the top and a peplum at the hem. Unlined.
Jersey T-shirt in a cotton blend with short slits in the sides.
Short, straight T-shirt dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Angular sunglasses with concealed frames and slim sidepieces in metal. Adjustable nose pads and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Top in soft, printed jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Joggers in a lightweight viscose and Tencel™ lyocell weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, patch front pockets and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Chest pocket and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre with a lace trim. Lined cups, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and a small appliqué at the bottom.
Long-sleeved dress in printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a wide flounce at the hem.
Tube scarf in a soft cable knit containing some alpaca wool. Width approx. 53 cm, circumference approx. 150 cm.
Boxy top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
